True if the king has castled, false if not.
checkCastleMoveMade(Piece) - Method in class game.Chessboard
This method determines if the Piece object moved has castled and updates the board accordingly if it did.
checked - Variable in class pieces.King
True if the king is in check, false if not.
checkEnPassantMoveMade(Piece) - Method in class game.Chessboard
This method checks if the en passant move has been made so that the board may be updated accordingly.
checkEvaded() - Method in class pieces.King
This simply sets the king's check field to false.
checkForSavedGamesFolder() - Method in class game.GameStatus
Checks the current directory to see if there is a "Saved Games" folder It will create the folder if it doesn't exit.
checkPromotion(Piece) - Method in class game.Chessboard
This method promotes the pawn if it is on the opposite side of the board.
